Thanks for the upload.  Just a hint: I, personally, just search 'Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles' and then sort the torrents by most seeders and the newest episodes always are towards the top.  So even if the title has the wrong date you'll find what you need.  So its really not even a big deal that the date is wrong, I didn't even notice.  Just saw the complaining in the comments.
